name: Busch-VoiceControl
0:
”Alexa, turn on the ceiling light”
”Alexa, set the standard lamp to 50 percent”
”Alexa, set the blinds bedroom to 60 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With this skill, you control your KNX system simply by voice command.

-------------------------------------------------- -------------------
Requirements:

- A KNX system and a Busch-VoiceControl device
- The KNX system must be set up and ready for operation.
- You need a user account at mybuildings.abb.com.
 

-------------------------------------------------- -------------------
Installation:

1. Set up the Busch-VoiceControl.
2. Enable the Busch VoiceControl skill in the Amazon Alexa app.
3. Log in to mybuildings.abb.com with your username and password.
4. Click on "Search my devices". You will then receive a message indicating how many devices Alexa found.

For more information, see
http://new.abb.com/products/2CKA006136A0217

-------------------------------------------------- -------------------
Examples:

Turn on the light
"Alexa, turn on the ceiling light"

Light dimming
"Alexa, set the standard lamp to 50 percent"

Drive blinds / shutters
"Alexa, set the blinds bedroom to 60 percent"

Adjust temperature
"Alexa, set the living room temperature to 21 degrees"

-------------------------------------------------- -------------------
